app.title: FairMeet — Fair Meeting Scheduler for Distributed Teams
app.description: Meet fairly across time zones. Rotate obligations, protect focus, and export to calendar.

hero.badge: The New Standard for Fair Meeting Scheduling
hero.title: Meet fairly across time zones
hero.description: Rotate obligations, protect focus, and agree faster.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for fair meeting scheduling

fairnessEngine.title: Fairness engine
fairnessEngine.description: Rotate meeting times so no one always pays the late-night tax.

smartOverlap.title: Smart overlap
smartOverlap.description: Suggest the best slots based on working hours, no-meeting blocks, and required attendees.

focusGuard.title: Focus guard
focusGuard.description: Avoid back-to-back marathons and preserve deep-work blocks.

calendarReady.title: Calendar ready
calendarReady.description: One-click export to Google Calendar or ICS.

shareToDecide.title: Share to decide
shareToDecide.description: A read-only link your team can review without signing up.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your team size

fairness.a: We track the frequency of inconvenient meeting times (before 7 AM or after 9 PM) for each team member based on their local time, and distribute them equally to ensure long-term fairness for all team members.

calendars.a: We integrate with Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, Apple Calendar, and other major calendar services. ICS file downloads are also supported for use with any calendar app.

freeLimits.q: What are the limitations of the free plan?
freeLimits.a: The free plan allows 1 team, up to 5 members, and 2 recommendation generations per week. For more features, please upgrade to the Pro plan.

demo.title: Sample Team Meeting Recommendations
demo.subtitle: Check out fair meeting time recommendations for 4 global team members
demo.teamInfo: PT, UTC, IST, KST timezones • 45-minute meetings • Fairness rotation enabled
